class_notes: This course is permission only for those ENVS majors graduating in December 2024 or May 2025. If there is space available after all eligible seniors enroll, then current juniors may be considered. Please email Leah Thomas at leah.thomas@emory.edu for a permission number.
course_description: Credit, two hours. Weekly seminar on topics in Environmental Studies featuring speakers from within and outside the University. Students are required to read published articles authored by each speaker and submit weekly response papers. Group presentations on seminar topics are also required.
prerequisites: ENVS 120 or ENVS 130 or ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or ENVS 140 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: F 11:30am-1:10pm in New Psyc Bldg 290 (36 Eagle Ro
sections: Class Nbr: 2541, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 11:30a-1:10p, Instructor: E. Lonsdorf, Status: Open
